experience.title: Software Engineering Intern, Optiver APAC
experience.summary: Extended a core window of the main internal trading application (.NET, C#), performed big data analysis on trade execution, speed and success (Pandas, Python) and implemented autonomous, real-time trading software (C++).

experience.title: React Full Stack Web Developer, Contractor
experience.summary: Contracted by What’s-On Sydney to develop a review platform for local events. Built in React 16, the site uses the Contentful CMS and is exclusively client-side. Server-side functionality utilizes Firebase’s remote cloud functions.

experience.title: React Full Stack Web Developer Intern, Metigy
experience.summary: Responsible for the React implementation of the Metigy responsive analytics platform. Data and metrics needed to be parsed through a range of complex formatters before being interfaced through HighCharts graphs.

experience.title: Ruby on Rails Backend Developer, Contractor
experience.summary: Contracted as a freelance back-end developer by The Observership to implement a website remodel. Technologies include payment gateways (Stripe and PayPal), AWS S3 storage and Salesforce CRM integration.

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer, Brieff
experience.summary: Employed as a front-end engineer to build custom interfaces and integrate with a Ruby on Rails backend.
